content:
{
  "name": "lazer-game-core",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "The core logic for lazer-game",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "https://github.com/rdfriedl/lazer-game-core.git",
  "author": "Robert Friedl <rdfriedl@gmail.com>",
  "main": "dist/lazer-game-core.js",
  "browser": "dist/lazer-game-core.umd.js",
  "module": "dist/lazer-game-core.es.js",
  "jsnext:main": "dist/lazer-game-core.es.js",
  "scripts": {
    "precommit": "pretty-quick --staged",
    "commitmsg": "commitlint -e $GIT_PARAMS",
    "commit": "commit",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run build",
    "clean": "rimraf dist",
    "prebuild": "npm run clean",
    "build": "webpack --mode production",
    "clean:test": "rimraf coverage",
    "pretest": "npm run clean:test",
    "test": "npm-run-all --parallel test:browser test:node",
    "test:browser": "karma start karma.config.js --single-run",
    "test:node": "mocha --compilers js:babel-register --R spec test/node.js",
    "test:debug": "karma start karma.config.js --browsers Chrome --no-single-run",
    "format": "prettier --write ./**/*.{js,json,css,md}",
    "predocs": "rimraf docs",
    "docs": "esdoc"
  },
  "directories": {
    "test": "./test/",
    "lib": "./src/"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=6.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "lodash": "^4.17.5",
    "p2": "^0.7.1",
    "regexp-events": "^1.0.2",
    "shortid": "^2.2.8"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@commitlint/cli": "^6.1.3",
    "@commitlint/config-conventional": "^6.1.3",
    "@commitlint/prompt-cli": "^6.1.3",
    "@semantic-release/changelog": "^2.0.1",
    "@semantic-release/git": "^4.0.1",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.4",
    "babel-plugin-lodash": "^3.3.2",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-register": "^6.26.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "core-js": "^2.5.3",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "istanbul-instrumenter-loader": "^3.0.0",
    "karma": "^2.0.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-coverage-istanbul-reporter": "^1.4.2",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.1.0",
    "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-mocha-reporter": "^2.2.5",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^1.0.4",
    "karma-sinon-chai": "^1.3.3",
    "karma-source-map-support": "^1.2.0",
    "karma-webpack": "^3.0.0",
    "mocha": "^5.0.4",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.2",
    "prettier": "^1.11.1",
    "pretty-quick": "^1.4.1",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.2",
    "semantic-release": "^15.1.3",
    "sinon": "^4.4.8",
    "sinon-chai": "^3.0.0",
    "source-map-loader": "^0.2.3",
    "webpack": "^4.2.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^2.0.12"
  },
  "prettier": {
    "useTabs": true,
    "semi": true,
    "trailingComma": "all",
    "printWidth": 120
  },
  "commitlint": {
    "extends": [
      "@commitlint/config-conventional"
    ]
  },
  "release": {
    "verifyConditions": [
      "@semantic-release/changelog",
      "@semantic-release/git",
      "@semantic-release/github"
    ],
    "prepare": [
      "@semantic-release/changelog",
      {
        "path": "@semantic-release/git",
        "assets": [
          "package.json",
          "package-lock.json",
          "CHANGELOG.md",
          "dist"
        ],
        "message": "chore(release): ${nextRelease.version} [skip ci]\n\n${nextRelease.notes}"
      }
    ],
    "publish": [
      "@semantic-release/github"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
